channel.title: Jonathan's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Jonathan's Sports Blog

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Jonathan Zettler. I am senior at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln majoring in Sports Media and Communications and I will be posting visualizations here that I produce from breaking down data in sports like football, basketball, volleyball, and golf.

item.title: Did Nebraska Basketball get better throughout the 2022 Season
item.description: This is the story of whether Nebraska Basketball improved, regressed, or stayed the same throughout the 2022 season. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.6 ✓ dplyr 1.0.7 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.3 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.0.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggplot2) Nebraska2022GameLogs <- read_csv("data/Nebraska2022GameLogs.
